title: A reioynder to Bristows replie in defence of Allens scroll of articles and booke of purgatorie Also the cauils of Nicholas Sander D. in Diuinitie about the supper of our Lord, and the apologie of the Church of England, touching the doctrine thereof, confuted by William Fulke, Doctor in Diuinitie, and master of Pembroke Hall in Cambridge. Seene and allowed.
author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.
publisher: Printed by H. Middleton for George Bishop,
notes: An answer to: Bristow, Richard.  A reply to Fulke, in defense of M. D. Allens scroll of articles, and booke of purgatorie; and Sander, Nicholas.  The supper of our Lord set foorth in six bookes.
"The cauils of Nicholas Sander .. about the supper of our Lord .." has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University Library.
